Package shapes3d.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SConstants
    Constants used by the library available to the user.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera<T extends Camera<T>>
    Base class for all cameras.
    GL
    Some experimental methods to control face culling.
    Heightmap  
    HeightmapOSN  
    Image
    Small collection of methods to create mirrored or rotated images from an original image.
    IntervalTimer
    Simple timer class to measure elapsed time.
    Log
    Usage Log.logger().info(...) etc.
    MD2
    This class is used to load MD2 model data and skin texture from files
    MD2_AnimState
    Simple class to store that details of an animation sequence in the model.
    MD2_Data
    This class is a simple structure to store MD2 data loaded from a file using the MD2 class.
    MD2_Vertex
    For each point in the model we store the texture coordinates and an index pointer to an array of PVector that hold the XYZ coordinates.
    Messages
    Simple class to display messages from the library
    OpenSimplexNoise
    OpenSimplex Noise in Java.
    OpenSimplexNoiseTileable3D
    This class is not used for the moment - left in for possible future versions of Shapes3D
    Orientation
    Objects of this class can be used to change the origin [0,0,0] and UP vector for the model-view coordinates.
    Perspective
    This class holds the details for a perspective that can be applied to a PGraphics3D object.
    Picked
    A simple immutable class to record the shape and part number returned by the Shape3D.pick(...) method.
    Pilot
    Work in progress
    ShapeInspector
    An instance of this class can be used to inspect some parts of the shapes internal state
    TerrainCamera
    This camera can be used with the Terrain and Box classes to producea FP view.
    Textures
    This class is used to load bitmap files and create images.
    TransformUV
    A collection of classes used to perform rotations on UV coordinates.
    Triangulator
    Based on source code found on the Internet and modified by the author to work directly with Processing.
    Util
    A variety of utility methods used by the library.
    UV
    Simple class to hold texture coordinates.
